email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 75,000 MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai under CIF terms. Our initial quote is $22 per metric ton.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. Please let us know your thoughts and if you have any specific requirements for the laycan or loading window.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the quote. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. We are looking to secure a competitive rate for this shipment.

Could you review the rate and possibly offer a discount? Also, could you provide the laycan and demurrage rate per day?

Thanks,
Alex Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your prompt response. Considering your feedback, we can offer a revised rate of $20 per metric ton. The laycan is 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25, and the demurrage rate will be $25,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements and if you need any further details on the laycan or stem.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $20 per metric ton is more in line with our expectations. However, we need to ensure that the laytime is sufficient. Could you confirm the laytime start and end dates?

Best,
Alex Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

The laytime will start on 2023-10-20 and end on 2023-10-25. We can offer a laytime of 5 days with the demurrage rate of $25,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if these terms are acceptable.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We are satisfied with the terms and the laytime period. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Thanks,
Alex Carter
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Maritime Brokers
